text: The [[Finders Guild]] of House [[Tharashk]] isn’t allowed to prospect in the [[Towering Wood]], but the [[Sylbaran]] Council has recently allowed Tharashk to establish an outpost for the [[Liondrake's Roar]]—the branch of the guild that brokers [[Droaam]]ite services. Guildmaster [[Kard'Aashta]] is still completing the work on the outpost and building up her staff; primarily it serves as a way station for mercenaries passing through town.
title: Liondrake's Roar Sylbaran Outpost
